production

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • production.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class that handles the logic for the GUI to Database relationship.
    Author:
    Derek Schweizer

      • Controller

    • Method Detail

      • actionAddButton

        public void actionAddButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Adds user inputted data into the Product database.

        When the users clicks the Add button this method will collect the required data (item name, manufacturer, item type) and create an SQL statement to execute that adds that item to the database.

        Parameters:
        actionEvent - The action of when the button is clicked.

      • actionCreateEmployee

        public void actionCreateEmployee()
        Method called when the user clicks the 'Create Employee' button on the Employee tab. Displays an Alert with the Employee's information when created and an error alert if the user entered incorrect information.

      • actionRecordProduction

        public void actionRecordProduction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Method that records the completed production and quantity of a selected item.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - The action of when the button is clicked.

      • addToProductionDB

        private void addToProductionDB(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionRecord> productionRun)
        Takes an ArrayList of specified type and loops through it and adds it as a row in the database.
        Parameters:
        productionRun - ArrayList of type ProductionRecord that is declared at class level used for storing ProductionRecord objects which will then be added to the database.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes any GUI fields or parameters when the GUI is launched.

      • initializeDatabaseInfo

        private void initializeDatabaseInfo()
        Called during initialization. Loads database credentials from properties file.

      • loadProductionLog

        private void loadProductionLog()
        Method called during initialization. This method queries the ProductionRecord table and creates a new ProductionRecord object and adds it to the productionLog ObservableList.

      • loadProductList

        private void loadProductList()
        Method called during initialization. This method queries the Product database and for each row it creates a new Product object and adds them to the class level ArrayList productLine.

      • reverseDatabasePassword

        private java.lang.String reverseDatabasePassword(java.lang.String pw)
        Reverses the database password from the properties file and returns it.
        Parameters:
        pw - The database password from the properties file that needs to be reversed.
        Returns:
        A reversed string.

      • setupListViewPlaceholder

        private void setupListViewPlaceholder()
        Method called in the initialize method that sets the placeholder text of the two ListViews.

      • setupProductionLineTable

        private void setupProductionLineTable()
        Called during initialization. Registers ProductionRecord object properties to TableView columns and adds all items from the list to the table.

      • setupProductLineTable

        private void setupProductLineTable()
        Method called during initialization. It registers two columns in the existing products ListView displayed in the GUI and sets its contents to the class level ArrayList productLine.

      • setupProductListView

        private void setupProductListView()
        Method called during initialization. This method sets the contents of the record production ListView.
